edu.packt.neuralnet.math

Class ArrayOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.packt.neuralnet.math.ArrayOperations

  • public class ArrayOperations
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has static functions that are used to make array operations, i.e., get max and min value of an array, calculate average and std dev of an array, etc
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Alan de Souza, Fabio Soares
